column3: Find All Columns should hide in the  Source code text editor  text simple view
column4: issue specified in this STAR was found during the validation done in  P10049895-125342  [Verdi-GUI] Support Unified Find Phase III and make GA         We should hide the "Find All Columns" options in  Source code text editor  text simple view.    since source code don’t have multiple column.

column3: Incorrect Result for Unified Find search result in Source code text editor  text simple view
column4: issue specified in this STAR was found during the validation done in  P10049895-125342  [Verdi-GUI] Support Unified Find Phase III and make GA         VCS version used in testing : S-2022.06-Alpha_Full64    VCS_HOME : /remote/vtgimages/SAFE/linux64_TD/release-structure/vcs-mx    -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------    Verdi version used in testing : S-2022.06-ALPHA    VERDI_HOME : /remote/vtgimages/SAFE/linux64_TD.VERDI/release-structure/verdi    -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------              [Testcase]         ~stars/testcases/<Star ID>         /remote/vgrnd21/asitha/9_TEMP/annot                   [How to reproduce]        # setenv VERDI_UNIFIED_FIND 1   # Set Verdi and Vcs   # perl prologue.pl   # verdi -play annot.cmd   # Open \testbench.fout  in Source code text simple view   # Search with || operator "ex hiv || lov"    # Turn on "Find Whole Word Only" and Search for "d2"         [Issue]        # In step  5  "lov" second part of or operator is not highlighted (this issue exists in both Source code text editor and text simple view)   # In step 6 "d2a" is highlighted                       Please refer the attached images              Please fix the aforementioned issue.
column5: Hi Jiangzhe     Could you help check this issue  you can refer to source code support  thanks.   # The or operator seems not work   # Should not support "Find Whole Words Only"?   # No multiple columns  should hide "Find in All Columns"?Hi Asitha     Source code window should not support OR operator  same as editor/simple view  please refer to the original Unified Find spec:    [https://sp-vg/sites/verdi/Verdi%20Internal%20Documents/RD/nWave/Functional_Spec/6000022337_Refine_Existed_Features_Provide_Unified_Find.docx]    =>    "Support multiple keywords by OR operator (“||”) in “Default Match” mode  except source code"Source code window should not support OR operator  same as editor/simple view

column3: [Verdi-GUI][Safety Aware] Setting change when reopen the Verdi
column4: issue specified in this STAR was found during the validation done in  P10049895-53767- [Verdi-GUI] Preference Qt Porting and Refinement         Verdi version used in testing : Q-2020.12-Alpha    -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------    Verdi 2020.12 build : "/remote/vtgimages/SAFE/linux64_TD.VERDI/release-structure/verdi"         VCS version used in testing : O-2020.12-Alpha_Full64    -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------    VCS 2020.12 build : "/remote/vtgimages/SAFE/linux64_TD/release-structure/vcs-mx/bin/vcs"         [Testcase]    Path : Verilog RTL Demo Case         [How to reproduce]   # Set Verdi Home and VCS Home   # setenv VERDI_QT_PREF   # vcs -f run.f -kdb -lca -debug_access+all   # verdi -dbdir ./simv.daidir/   # Tools ->  Preference ->  Safety Aware   # Change any setting   # "Apply" the change   # Close Verdi and reopen         [Issue]         Setting change to default.         Please fix the aforementioned issue.
column5: Hi Luck     Please help to check the issue  and check if can fix before 2012-Beta CF on 9/18.  From: Asitha Sandakalum   Sent: Friday  September 11  2020 2:26 PM  To: Luck Chen <lukechen@synopsys.com>  Subject: RE: Issue clarify for P10049895-125743[Verdi-GUI][Safety Aware] Setting change when reopen the Verdi     Hi Luck     I check with “setenv VERDI_SSF_DEBUG”   It worked fine. Can you comment this on jira then I will close it.  Sorry for any inconvenience.    Thanks and Regards   Asitha      From: Luck Chen   Sent: Friday  September 11  2020 11:24 AM  To: Asitha Sandakalum <asitha@synopsys.com>  Subject: Issue clarify for P10049895-125743[Verdi-GUI][Safety Aware] Setting change when reopen the Verdi     Hi Asitha     For P10049895-125743  since safety debug doesn’t enable by default. So we don’t get the customize setting from novas.rc.  After enable safety debug  it works fine.  And the motif mode and QT mode has the same behavior.  So I don’t think it’s a bug  could you please help to double check and give comment.    Thanks.    Regards   Luck  Need to set "setenv VERDI_SSF_DEBUG"    Not a Bug.

column3: [QAT] PV testing for Preference form Qt migration
Mismatch between DVE and Verdi for loads of partially unconstrained array
column4: Verdi version used in testing: (O-2018.09-SP2-1)  /remote/vtgimages/SAFE/linux64_VERDI2018.09/release-structure/verdi    VCS version used in testing: (O-2018.09-SP2-1)  /remote/vtgimages/SAFE/linux_RH6_EM64T_VCS2018.09_mode64/release-structure/vcs-mx    How to reproduce:  --------------------------  1. Copy the test case from the following path            ~stars/testcases/<STAR_NUMBER>    2. Invoke Verdi from the following command        vhdlan unconstrained.vhd -vhdl08 -kdb        vcs top -debug_access+all -lca -kdb        simv -verdi &    3. Get the load of signal const2    Issue :    There’s a mismatch between DVE and Verdi when the loads of const2 is checked    Verdi –  out2 <= alias2(-1)(1)('a') + in1 + alias2(-1)(1)('b');  in1 <= const2(-1)(2)('a');    DVE –  Warning: [DVSW307]  Could not find any driver for signal: '/TOP/CONST2(-1 to 0)'.
column5: const2 is actually loaded on these 2 lines. verdi provides a better result  so I think this is not a problem.Closing due to BacklogClosing due to Backlog.

column3: Mismatch between Verdi and DVE in instance tree signal list for unnamed blocks
column4: Verdi version used in testing: (P-2019.06-Beta)  /remote/vtgimages/SAFE/linux64_VERDI2019.06/release-structure/verdi    VCS version used in testing: (P-2019.06-Beta)  /remote/vtgimages/SAFE/linux64_VCS2019.06/release-structure/vcs-mx      How to reproduce:  --------------------------  1. Copy the test case from the following path         ~stars/testcases/<STAR_NUMBER>    2. Compile and invoke with Verdi       vcs  test_b.v -sverilog -debug_access+all -lca -kdb -Xufe=dumpHier -Xufe=check_param_values        simv -verdi &      3. Invoke with DVE         simv -gui &    4. Select ‘m1.for_named[0].unnamed$$_0’ and view the signal list.    Issue 1:  The hierarchy tree of Verdi is different to the hierarchy tree of DVE when there are unnamed blocks.  Refer DVE_instancetree.JPG and Verdi_instancetree.JPG    Issue 2:  In DVE  a signal is not shown in Step 3. However a signal is shown in Verdi.  Refer DVE_signal.JPG and Verdi_signal.JPG

You may then upload the file from your desktop to this issue using Jira's standard *Attachments* functionality._CRM File Attachment: [DVE_signal.JPG|https://crmdbci.synopsys.com:9858/sap/bc/bsp/sap/zget_attach_url/geturl.htm?id=9001474677&attid=F4CE46B919BC1EE9909A4CC0DB297CC3&process_type=ZSTA]   _Download this file from SAP/CRM to your desktop using the link above. You may then upload the file from your desktop to this issue using Jira's standard *Attachments* functionality._CRM File Attachment: [Verdi_signal.JPG|https://crmdbci.synopsys.com:9858/sap/bc/bsp/sap/zget_attach_url/geturl.htm?id=9001474677&attid=F4CE46B919BC1EE9909A4DF8D2665CC3&process_type=ZSTA]   _Download this file from SAP/CRM to your desktop using the link above. You may then upload the file from your desktop to this issue using Jira's standard *Attachments* functionality._DVE flattened the generate construct  but Verdi treated it as hierarichal scope  which should be more accurate. Besides  "i" indeed exists in that scope  but DVE not show it seems be incorrect.Closing due to BacklogClosing due to Backlog.

column3: [NonBlk][Master] Reload/restoring doesn't cause non blocking to stop
column4: Verdi version used in testing: (O-2019.06-Alpha) /remote/vtgimages/SAFE/linux64_TD.VERDI/release-structure/verdi  How to reproduce: -------------------------- 1. Copy the test case from the following path.                ~stars/testcases/<STAR_NUMBER>  2. Set the env by the following command     setenv VERDI_NEW_SIGNAL_LIST_NONBLK 1     setenv VERDI_NEW_SIGNAL_LIST_NONBLK2 1  3. Invoke Verdi from the following command       vcs ten_million_sig.v -sverilog -lca -kdb -debug_all       simv -verdi &  4. Filter the string test* in the signal list and save the session before non blocking ends  5. Filter the string testSig_* and restore the session saved in Step 4 while non blocking is going on  6. Filter the string ‘test*’ and reload the design while non blocking is going on  Issue 1: Non blocking doesn’t end in the signal list when a new session is restored in Step 5. Verdi is still filtering the results in Step 5. Ideally  non blocking should end when a session is restored according to the functional spec.  STAR '9001393183 NonBlk][Master] Restoring a session causes Verdi to crash' was filed for the issue that Verdi crashes when a session that has finished non blocking process is restored.  Issue 2: Reloading the design doesn’t cause Verdi to stop the non blocking process in Step 6. Ideally  non blocking should end when a session is reloaded according to the functional spec.  Refer nonblock.cmd for the commands used.  The following appeared on the citrix shell ---------------------------------------------------------  --- Logging error --- Traceback (most recent call last):   File "py_link_cython/MLP/data_acquisition/data_acquisition_manager.py"  line 136  in MLP.data_acquisition.data_acquisition_manager.data_acquisition_manager.upload_data column5: Hi Jithmi  Per issue2  the filtering task stopped before restore session  current non-blocking task is for signal list creation.  BR  ZenoHi Zeno   The problem description was changed regarding Issue 2. 'When a session is restored..' should be 'when a session is reloaded..' Issue 2 is regarding reloading a session  not restoringClosing due to Backlog. Can not reproduce in TD.
